attributes.additional_details: people, especially young people, are exposed to a lot of stress due to the do and don'ts of coronavirus. opening clubs may decrease unpleasant emotions
attributes.background: the possibility of opening clubs to release negative emotions in this difficult time

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, whether you would like lockdown to be lifted, or a specific exemption from the stay at home rule for nightclubs and allowing them to reopen whilst other businesses remain closed.

If you would like all restrictions to be removed you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Petitions must include a full name.
